env.info: (hold 10) (plate 18) (at 0 8) (sort 1 human) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 teapoy) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (sort 3 television) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (sort 4 chair) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 sofa) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (sort 6 washmachine) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (type 6 container) (sort 7 cupboard) (size 7 big) (at 7 7) (type 7 container) (closed 7) (sort 8 closet) (size 8 big) (at 8 8) (type 8 container) (opened 8) (sort 9 microwave) (size 9 big) (at 9 9) (type 9 container) (sort 10 bottle) (size 10 small) (color 10 green) (sort 11 bottle) (size 11 small) (color 11 yellow) (sort 12 bottle) (size 12 small) (color 12 red) (sort 13 book) (size 13 small) (color 13 yellow) (sort 14 book) (size 14 small) (color 14 black) (sort 15 cup) (size 15 small) (color 15 blue) (sort 16 cup) (size 16 small) (color 16 red) (sort 17 can) (size 17 small) (sort 18 remotecontrol) (size 18 small) (color 18 white)

test.instr: (:ins (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y sofa))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X black) (sort Y television))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y closet))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X red))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X television))) )
test.nl: The washmachine is not opened. The microwave is not closed. The remotecontrol which is white must be on the plate. Put the remotecontrol on the sofa. Put the black book on the television. Take out the can from closet. Close closet. Give the bottle which is red to human. Go to the television.
